subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: The Colts trailed, 38-10, early in the third quarter but stormed back behind Andrew Luck, who threw for 443 yards and 4 scores, to beat the Chiefs in an A.F.C. wild-card game.
snippet: The Colts trailed, 38-10, early in the third quarter but stormed back behind Andrew Luck, who threw for 443 yards and 4 scores, to beat the Chiefs in an A.F.C. wild-card game.
